title: TU131 – Strange Situation: Surprising Attachment Science Uncovered, with Bethany Saltman
description: People are profoundly bad at predicting their own attachment status, and if you are trying to do that you are headed in the right direction.  :)  That sort of mindful inquiry is part of attachment security - learn more in today's episode.  Bethany Saltman and Sue Marriott discuss the Strange Situation, the original attachment research by Mary Ainsworth. They bring to life what it means and how to see it in everyday life.
itunes:subtitle: Attachment brought to life - learn more about the essence of what they found in the original science.
itunes:summary: People are profoundly bad at predicting their own attachment status, and if you are trying to do that you are headed in the right direction.  :)  That sort of mindful inquiry is part of attachment security - learn more in today's episode.
